Title: Expands support for living organ donation to include living donors who are residents of the state or are making a living donation in which the ultimate recipient is a resident of the state
Summary: Expands support for living organ donation to include living donors who are residents of the state or are making a living donation in which the ultimate recipient is a resident of the state.
LawCode: Amd ยง4371, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to expanding support for living organ donation to include living donors who are residents of the state or are making a living donation in which the ultimate recipient is a resident of the state
